attributes.action: ensure that if the Baby P killer Jason Owen kills again after being released early from his original jail sentence, as ordered by judges, those judges will be brought before the courts on a charge of accessory to murder before the fact.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judges, of course, never bear the consequences of their decisions.  It really is about time they started to consider what will happen to them if they get it wrong and their decision has a disastrous effect on somebody other than themselves.  Judges, you will remember, live the clossetted life of someone who is never subjected to the rigours of life under criminals regimes supported and nurtured by Nu-Labour and THEMSELVES.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
